resources.string: Type a podcast name or author

This activity might normally display previously selected search results, and the EditText might have a incremental or predictive search feature so the user can see podcast names and authors suggested to them as they type.
In Episode 1 we hear about the magic of multi screen apps
This allows the user to play a single episode and links to purchase a digital download.
You are purchasing a Digital download of Android Podcast 1 - Episode 1
Detailed usage instructions are available on https://stripe.com/docs/mobile/android.
We think you might be interested in these podcasts:
This is a list of podcasts matching the user\'s search terms. In the real implementation images might be shown alongside the names, and descriptions underneath.
This is a list of the episodes in a given podcast.
